title: Huawei Watch_Why does my watch sometimes mistakenly identify my motion state (running)? Why is the number of steps displayed on my watch sometimes different from my actual number of steps?
answer: The watch's exercise algorithm is designed to approximately record data for longer periods of exercise. View your exercise data after exercising for a certain period of time. Changing to a different type of exercise after a short period of time may affect the accuracy of your step data.
